sentence.Network_en: In the eye of the Buddhist, every worldly affair is vain.

entry.def: A Buddhist is a person whose religion is Buddhism.
Buddhist means relating or referring to Buddhism.

means.word_mean: 1. one who follows the teachings of Buddha
1. of or relating to or supporting Buddhism;
